posts.post_content: This is probably a one chance deal so make your best offer. I don't sell cards often, 5 in the last 10 years but if I get a crazy offer I'll part with it, might as well give someone a try to get it if they want it. Send me PM's on here if interested
Heck here is another one time offer while I got everything out

Email sent regarding CB / Myers

TED Z

Thanks to everyone who has wrote me. The CB back is still available for offers until Thursday night around 8pm. The Blank back has a ton of offers I have to sort through so pretend like it isn't there if you haven't made an offer yet :)

The original $750 offer on the CB was downgraded to $550 so it is still available until the time I leave for work tomorrow morning at 1030am. Otherwise he is going with me back to his steel tomb. I was willing to sell for $750 but for $550 I will keep it. If anyone wants to offer more than $550, now is the time to do it, or you can make the offer tomorrow night just to be a wiseass :)

The Blank Back is sold
